sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaTrophy, FaCertificate, FaMedal, FaStar, FaAward, FaGraduationCap, FaCode, FaExternalLinkAlt, FaDownload, FaEye, FaCalendarAlt, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaUsers, FaLaptopCode, FaRobot, FaShieldAlt, FaDatabase, FaGithub } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Achievements.css'; const Achievements = () => { const [selectedAchievement, setSelectedAchievement] = useState(null); const achievements = [ { id: 1, title: 'Academic Excellence', category: 'academic', year: '2023', issuer: 'University of Technology', description: 'Maintained strong academic performance in Software Engineering program, demonstrating excellence in programming, database systems, and computer science fundamentals.', icon: , color: '#8E9AAF', certificate: null, verification: null }, { id: 2, title: 'Programming Tutor Recognition', category: 'volunteering', year: '2023', issuer: 'Student Learning Center', description: 'Recognized for outstanding contribution as a programming tutor, helping fellow students improve their coding skills and understanding of computer science concepts.', icon: , color: '#FF6B6B', certificate: null, verification: null }, { id: 3, title: 'Web Development Projects', category: 'projects', year: '2025', issuer: 'Personal Portfolio', description: 'Successfully developed multiple web applications including car rental system, sustainable development goals showcase, and modern portfolio website.', icon: , color: '#4ECDC4', certificate: null, verification: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad' }, { id: 4, title: 'Database Management Excellence', category: 'academic', year: '2025', issuer: 'University of Technology', description: 'Demonstrated advanced understanding of database systems through comprehensive project development and implementation of complex data management solutions.', icon: , color: '#45B7D1', certificate: null, verification: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad/Advanced-Database-Project' }, { id: 5, title: 'Theory of Computation Project', category: 'academic', year: '2025', issuer: 'Computer Science Department', description: 'Successfully implemented Theory of Computation concepts including automata, formal languages, and computational complexity in Java.', icon: , color: '#96CEB4', certificate: null, verification: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad/TOC' }, { id: 6, title: 'Open Source Contribution', category: 'community', year: '2024', issuer: 'GitHub Community', description: 'Active contributor to open-source projects and maintainer of personal repositories showcasing various programming skills and project implementations.', icon: , color: '#333333', certificate: null, verification: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad' }, { id: 7, title: 'Data Management Project', category: 'projects', year: '2025', issuer: 'Personal Portfolio', description: 'Developed Python-based publication log system for managing and tracking academic documents and research papers.', icon: , color: '#FFA07A', certificate: null, verification: 'https://github.com/BasantAwad/Publication_Log' } ]; const categories = [ { key: 'all', label: 'All Achievements', icon: , count: achievements.length }, { key: 'academic', label: 'Academic', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'academic').length }, { key: 'certification', label: 'Certifications', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'certification').length }, { key: 'competition', label: 'Competitions', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'competition').length }, { key: 'recognition', label: 'Recognition', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'recognition').length } ]; const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('all'); const filteredAchievements = activeFilter === 'all' ? achievements : achievements.filter(achievement => achievement.category === activeFilter); const openAchievementModal = (achievement) => { setSelectedAchievement(achievement); }; const closeAchievementModal = () => { setSelectedAchievement(null); }; const getCategoryIcon = (category) => { const icons = { academic: , certification: , competition: , recognition: }; return icons[category] || ; }; const getCategoryColor = (category) => { const colors = { academic: '#8E9AAF', certification: '#CBC0D3', competition: '#EFD3D7', recognition: '#EBCEE5' }; return colors[category] || '#8E9AAF'; }; return (

Achievements & Certifications

Recognition of my hard work and dedication

Filter Achievements

{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{filteredAchievements.map((achievement) => (
{achievement.icon}
{achievement.category} {achievement.year}

{achievement.title}

{achievement.issuer}

{achievement.description}

Download
))}

Interested in my qualifications?

Download my complete resume or get in touch to discuss opportunities.

View Resume Contact Me
{/* Achievement Modal */} {selectedAchievement && (
e.stopPropagation()} >
{selectedAchievement.icon}

{selectedAchievement.title}

Category: {selectedAchievement.category}
Year: {selectedAchievement.year}
Issuer: {selectedAchievement.issuer}

Description

{selectedAchievement.description}

Download Certificate Verify Online
)}
); }; export default Achievements;
